author: Devin Dwyer, Jacqueline Yoo
title: Making 'PPE' at home: Families use 3D printers to address coronavirus shortages
description: In basements and garages across America, a cottage industry of 3D printing is gaining steam to address PPE shortages amid the novel coronavirus pandemic.
content:
In basements and garages across America, a cottage industry of 3D printing is gaining steam to fight the novel coronavirus.
Entire families, from Louisiana to Montana, are forming in-home production lines for personal protective equipment for hospital worker… [+6135 chars]
